name: Where's My Phone?!
description:
You've lost your phone... again! You'd better find it and finish up your tasks in time before your wife comes flying through the window to yell at you about how incompetent you are.

Race against the clock to get your list of house chores done AND find your lost phone before something bad happens! Each level has a different task list to complete within your home, and the completion of each level will progress the story dialogue.

Some of your tasks may include:
- Brushing your teeth
- Cooking
- Hiding your friend from his crazy ex
- Cleaning the dishes

And definitely be careful NOT to break anything, trash the house, read non-work-safe magazines, or forget your phone! Doing chores is not supposed to be fun! This game is for serious gamers who are serious about getting a list of tasks done and done right!
